sk1.name: Breathe Fire
sk1.desc: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.

sk2.name: Dragon Tail
sk2.desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

sk3.name: Dragon Blood
sk3.desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

sk4.name: Elder Dragon Form
sk4.desc: Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.Level 1: Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack./ Level 2: Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack./ Level 3: Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
